description:
There`s nothing wrong with having a big butt. There`s nothing wrong with having big breasts, either. It`s actually a good thing. Setting that aside, the battle between Mashiro and Konoha continues. They go to the roof to have it out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Imouto no Kanashimi o Iyasu no wa, Imouto
Only a Little Sister Can Soothe Sadness over a Little Sister
妹の悲しみをいやすのは, 妹
